statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed 's|.*/||'); branch=$(git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[33m%s\033[0m \033[32m%s\033[0m' "$model" "$branch" "$dir"
